channel.title: Eiditing DAT files (character files)
channel.description: im currently messing around with a couple 508 servers (example, Palidno76s) and im trying to make myself an admin, but i dont know how to edit a DAT file :/ (i did change stuff in there, but it didnt work at all, when i logged in again it just reset the account) so could anyone tell me where im screwing up? and how i can edit (and have it work) character files please?

item.title: Eiditing DAT files (character files)
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Assuming it has the extension of .dat because it is a serialized object, you can edit it using ObjectInputStream, and ObjectInputStream.

Read full topic

item.title: Eiditing DAT files (character files)
item.dc:creator: @1337_owns 1337 owns
item.description:
@1337_owns wrote:

[quote=“Johnlukey, post:1, topic:251625”]im currently messing around with a couple 508 servers (example, Palidno76s) and im trying to make myself an admin, but i dont know how to edit a DAT file
(i did change stuff in there, but it didnt work at all, when i logged in again it just reset the account)
so could anyone tell me where im screwing up? and how i can edit (and have it work) character files please?[/quote]Login.java for 508s

Read full topic

item.title: Eiditing DAT files (character files)
item.dc:creator: @Cookescape_Man Cookescape Man
item.description:
@Cookescape_Man wrote:

Man make sure you are not running the server or logged in to the account or it won’t work

Read full topic

item.title: Eiditing DAT files (character files)
item.dc:creator: @newserver newserver
item.description:
@newserver wrote:

all wrong, if you get chineese charecters, open in wordpad, not notepad, and also IN 508 THERE IS NO 3 FOR OWNER IT’S ONLY 2 AND 1 2-ADMIN 1-MOD ty, yw, learn to code a 508 before giving help for a 317 server when someone is asking about a 508.

Read full topic

item.title: Eiditing DAT files (character files)
item.dc:creator: @rune-pure rune-pure
item.description:
@rune-pure wrote:

nope all you need to do is open the file with notepad…

FInd player rights

Put a 3 where the 0 is

Read full topic

item.description:

nope, neither worked.
is ther elike something special i need to do, like an admin list i need to add the account to?

item.description:

Try compling after…?

IF that dosnt work then try decompiling then running

item.title: Eiditing DAT files (character files)
item.dc:creator: @Johnlukey Johnlukey
item.description:
@Johnlukey wrote:

yes i tried that, just like with 317 servers, but it never works, when i log in it just resets the file.
(and sometimes its a bunch fo crap like this 敭敭敭敭敭敭敭敭敭敭敭敭敭敭)

item.title: Eiditing DAT files (character files)
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Open it with Wordpad/Notepad/Notepad++ and edit it, then save as ‘playername.dat’.

Not hard.

Read full topic

item.title: Eiditing DAT files (character files)
item.dc:creator: @rune-pure rune-pure
item.description:
@rune-pure wrote:

Open it with note pad…

And edit the rights…

Easy as that

Read full topic
